description: Bisulfite-Seq data for 1 erythroblast sample(s). 14 run(s), 1 experiment(s), 1 alignment(s). Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2014. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20140811/homo_sapiens/README_bisulphite_analysis_CNAG_20140811
title: BLUEPRINT release August 2014, Bisulfite-Seq for erythroblast
